Quickstrike:







Quickstrike was actually shaking. His arms, his legs. His chest rose and 
felt quickly, as if in panting movements. He looked at Transulas now coming 
to him, with a med kit. He thought with his, damage it wouldn't help too 
much.

He looked back at Mentella. "Yer joinin'?" His voice was a little quivery to 
sound tough and solid as he usually was. But the last few days were stress 
for the little Fuzor. "Good." He could feel his head lightly shaking. He 
wanted it to stop. "S-stick wit' us." Then he quickly added, "Jus' don't go 
near Hell Beast! Ya chit-chat wit' him, ah'll kill ya."
